Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small SymmetricSystem Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small SymmetricSystem AllSmallSymmetricSystem is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic symmetricsystem models from orders 2 to 7.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of SymmetricSystem formulas(SymmetricSystem).
x*(x*y) = y.
x*(y*z) = (x*y)*(x*z).
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
